text:
So I have been trying to get this resolved but no help as of yet.

The cookie banner blocking beta is blocking dynamically loaded scripts from scripts which are themselves ignored using the "data-hs-ignore" attribute, How do we get this resolved.

Anyone who can help? <@U7SL518D6>
Hi I want to trigger a message/email template to HubSpot inbox on button click  from my external website is there a possibility
Yeah, you can do it with serverless functions or form submissions.
Oh how to create that do you know any proper documentation link
I just have a button on which I want to pass the data
